name: T - Sonia Mia
_source: speak;Sonia; Hey, I know your kind. Pirate, right?
speak;Sonia; Seems odd you're not with a pirate crew, though.{w} Were you captured?
speak;Mia; Hah! As if these metalheads could restrain me!{w} I'm a bit of a naval freelancer nowadays.
speak;Sonia; I'm glad to have you on board with us now!{w} Surely you can sail us to Rosefall with ease!
speak;Mia; Heh, bet yer ass I could!{w} Say, maybe I could make a pirating comeback{tgm}...{tgm}with you all as my crew!{w} Hahaha! I like the sound of that!
